section.title: User Interface
section.para: Oden basically provides CLI(Command Line Interface) environment, and a special GUI environment for user convenience.

section.title: Command Line Interface
section.para: Command can be transferred to Oden through script provided in Oden Server. For more information, refer to "Working with Command Line".

section.title: Graphical User Interface
section.para: GUI environment called Oden Admin is provided to use Oden more conveniently.
